title: Olivia
description: When Olivia turns sixteen she is sent to a Parisian finishing school to broaden her education. Soon after her arrival, she finds herself falling under the spell of her beautiful and charismatic teacher. But Mademoiselle Julieâ€™s life is not as straightforward as Olivia imagines and the school year is destined to end abruptly in tragedy.
author: Dorothy Strachey
